amendatorysection.para: For purposes of sections 77-27,228 to 77-27,234, qualified endowment means a permanent, irrevocable fund that is used for Nebraska charitable purposes and held by a Nebraska incorporated or established organization that:
(1)(a) Is a tax-exempt organization under section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended; or
(b) Is a bank or trust company that is holding the fund on behalf of a tax-exempt organization; and
(2) Holds the fund as a permanent endowment fund.
